# Station Alert - Zulu
[italic]Called by: Central Command Only.[/italic]
[bold]Conditions:[/bold]
Central Command has decided that the captain of the station is not abiding by Nanotrasens policies and a ordered demotion has been refused or failed.
[bold]Security:[/bold]
All security members are to arm and arrest the captain by any means necessary.
[bold]Secure Areas:[/bold]
There are no restrictions on bolting Secure Areas. Secure Areas may be left bolted or unbolted at the discretion of security personnel;
[bold]General Crew:[/bold]
All personnel must maximise their suit sensors.
All personnel should remain in their department, and await further orders.
Personnel are required to follow all Central Command orders until a new captain is appointed.
